products.title: Vitra Blackout Zinc Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Zinc Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Zinc roller blind in a beautiful grey colour. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX0531 Fabric Colour: Zinc Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Slate Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Slate Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout slate grey fabric is a chic darker grey colour, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Slate grey is bold enough to be used as a statement shade within your interior styling.  
 
Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.  
 
This child-safe, electric roller blind can be upgrade for use with smart phones, Amazon Alexa and Google Home Hub devices.  At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this Electric Roller Blind made by our expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year gurarantee!
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2209 Fabric Colour: Slate Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
